38 //
39 // Base class for all state types. The key feature of all states is that they
40 // have (x, y, z) coordinates which may be accessed.
41 //
43 
44 #include <fastrack/state/state.h>
45

47 namespace state {
48 
49 // Random number generator shared across all instances of states.
50 std::random_device State::rd_;
51 std::default_random_engine State::rng_ = std::default_random_engine(State::rd_());
52 
53 } //\namespace state
54 } //\namespace fastrack
